PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-02602011-03-03,  NRCAN,  NEB,  ,  , 
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectApproval of Order GC-116 (National Energy Board Certificate)
PrecisOrder approving the issuance by the National Energy Board of Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity No. GC-116 for an authorization to construct and operate the Mackenzie Valley Pipeline, which is part of the Mackenzie Gas Project. The certificate will be issued to Imperial Oil Resources Ventures Limited (Proponent) on behalf of itself, the Mackenzie Valley Aboriginal Pipeline Limited Partnership, ConocoPhillips Northern Partnership, ExxonMobil Canada Properties and Shell Canada Limited as managing partner of Shell Canada Energy.
AttachmentsAttachment
